name: iscld2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c0)))

stmt.origin: baibd(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c0))
stmt.pretty: baibd(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0), (c2 \ c1)∈ c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c0))))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c0)))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))

comment: A subset of the underlying set of a topology is closed iff its complement is open. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2006.)
